reviewText: I thoroughly enjoy watching the old "Topper" shows again.  They are so entertaining, and so mild (ghost-wise) that even a child could watch them and not have nightmares.  These are really fun, and very nostalgic movies.
Title: Topper: Volume 1-2

reviewText: Topper  1 & 2  has very poor quality.  It looks like it never has been restored.  If you like the Topper series buy  THE ADVENTURES OF TOPPER  for  $ 3.99.  It has  9 episodes  and they are very good.
Title: Topper: Volume 1-2

reviewText: This is a classic with a Great Cast!! Picture and sound fair but worth seeing again! If you love the 50's shows you will enjoy!
Title: Topper: Volume 1-2

reviewText: It wasn't theTopper I was looking for but it's ok for an old show.I have not complaints .
Title: Topper: Volume 1-2

reviewText: TOPPER IS ONE OF THE BEST TV SERIES OF ANY GENERATION. I CAN NEVER GET ENOUGH OF IT AND HAVE BOUGHT IT FOR OTHER'S TO ENJOY. AND IT IS AS CLEAN AS YOU CAN GET. A GREAT STEP BACK TO A BETTER TIME IN THE 50'S.
Title: Topper: Volume 1-2

reviewText: Enjoyed watching it with the family loaned them to my sister for her family to watch and enjoy as we watched them as kids.
Title: Topper: Volume 1-2

reviewText: Topper is a wonderful series. Reminds us of when TV shows were really entertaining, not just marketing nonsense, cheap horror, mindless violence or scatological collegiate humour dumbed own for the masses.
Title: Topper: Volume 1-2

reviewText: I did get this movie on time, but the picture and audio quality were poor.I donated it to my local Goodwill.
Title: Topper: Volume 1-2

reviewText: i enjoy watching older movies and this is one of them.  the movie line is easy to follow and not as violent as some others.
Title: Topper: Volume 1-2

reviewText: When I was young, I loved this show on Television. I truly thought that the stuff shirt "man" of the house" was very funny and acted the part of Topper very well so when I saw they were available I purchased it. I stil love it. The acting is understated and his reactions to the "spirits" are really quite funny. The supporting cast is excellent, as is the script. This is better then the Cary Grant movie (which is enjoyable, just different). If you saw that you will enjoy this. This is not for everyone however as times have changed and I am not sure that all will see and understand the humour in it however it is well worth a try. The video is old however I found the series to be fine to watch.
summary: A great old TV series from my youth. Most enjoyable!
Title: Topper: Volume 1-2
